    ma02_resources.project.Edition[] getIncompleteEditions()
    Iterates through the array of editions, calling the getIncompleteProjectsFromEdition for each one, and adding every edition with unfinished projects into an array
    ma02_resources.project.Project[] getIncompleteProjectsFromActive()
    Searches the projects of the active edition, and returns an array containing those that aren't finished The criteria for whether a project is finished or not, is whether there's at least one submission per task
    ma02_resources.project.Project[] getIncompleteProjectsFromEdition​(ma02_resources.project.Edition edition)
    Searches the projects within an edition and returns an array containing those that are finished.

    Sets the active edition, making sure no other editions are active and the edition exists

    • getIncompleteProjectsFromActive

      public ma02_resources.project.Project[] getIncompleteProjectsFromActive()
      Searches the projects of the active edition, and returns an array containing those that aren't finished The criteria for whether a project is finished or not, is whether there's at least one submission per task
      Specified by:
      getIncompleteProjectsFromActive in interface EditionsManagement
      Returns:
      an array of all the unfinished projects within the active edition

    • getIncompleteProjectsFromEdition

      public ma02_resources.project.Project[] getIncompleteProjectsFromEdition​(ma02_resources.project.Edition edition)
      Searches the projects within an edition and returns an array containing those that are finished. The criteria for whether a project is finished or not, is whether there's at least one submission per task
      Specified by:
      getIncompleteProjectsFromEdition in interface EditionsManagement
      Parameters:
      edition - edition to be searched for unfinished projects.
